name: MTLFunctionLog
desc: A log entry generated when the Metal device object executed a command buffer.

items.name: var type: MTLFunctionLogType
items.desc: The type of message that was logged.

items.name: enum MTLFunctionLogType
items.desc: Options for different kinds of function logs.

items.name: var debugLocation: MTLFunctionLogDebugLocation?
items.desc: If known, the location of the logging command within a shader source file.

items.name: var encoderLabel: String?
items.desc: The label for the encoder that logged the message.

items.name: var function: MTLFunction?
items.desc: When known, the function object corresponding to the logged message.

items.name: protocol MTLFunctionLogDebugLocation
items.desc: The source code that logged a debug message.
